categories: Category:Victory-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Tempest was a Victory-class Star Destroyer in service in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War.

Around 8 ABY it was almost destroyed when escaping from the planet Dulathia when the New Republic liberated the planet. Under command of Captain Emba it carried components for the V-150 anti-orbital ion cannon and safely reached Garos IV. After that it rendezvoused with the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Judicator at Borderlands when Grand Admiral Thrawn took complete control of the Imperial Navy.
